messages.title: Nick Clegg came out on top
messages.content: The second election debate was much closer than the first, but again Nick Clegg proved the winner. In a debate dominated by issues like Iraq, immigration and climate change, Nick Clegg again answered the questions that Brown and Cameron could not.

messages.title: Desperate Conservatives and Labour turn nasty in election
messages.content: Polls this week have shown the Liberal Democrats in the lead in the General Election. Labour and the Conservatives and their friends in the media have reacted by going negative and nasty.

issues.governance: In a debate dominated by issues like Iraq, immigration and climate change, Nick Clegg again answered the questions that Brown and Cameron could not.
issues.immigration: In a debate dominated by issues like Iraq, immigration and climate change, Nick Clegg again answered the questions that Brown and Cameron could not.

leaflet.personalStatement: We need to put people before politics

quotes.text: Nick Clegg came out on top
"Desperate Conservatives and Labour turn nasty in election"
